document_data.name: Thaalis
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaalis''' was a [[lizardfolk]] [[cleric]] of [[Semuanya]].  She resided in the mines below [[Baeniff Tor]] in the [[Evermoors]] where she sacrificed victims to the [[giant crocodile]], [[Kheshebik]], who she and the [[Khoroshen]] tribe of lizardfolk believed to be an avatar of the deity [[Semuanya]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|24}}
document_data.Appearance: Thaalis' scales were green and yellow.  She had a large scar on her face and the end of her tail was missing.
document_data.Possessions: Thaalis wore crocodile [[hide armor]] reinforced with parts of [[chain mail]] and [[plate mail]].  She wielded a club adorned with the vertebrae from crocodiles.
